title: Key Strategies
text1: We envision an Alabama where everyone has the chance to take part in profoundly ingrained learning experiences. The cultural component of this goal cannot be ignored and we are taking steps to ensure cultural education and interactions are made accessible to broaden the worldviews of all members of our communities.
list: Bring cultural learning to Alabama in fresh and enjoyable new ways
Introduce performances, exhibitions, art, community conferences and signature events such as the Korean Cultural Experience
Advocate cross-cultural learning experiences and sharing knowledge
